thread.title: American tourist shot in taxi robbery
thread.title_full: American tourist shot in taxi robbery

author: eTN Managing Editor
title: American tourist shot in taxi robbery
text:
American tourist shot in taxi robbery   
Sep 26, 2015 eTN   
The UNWTO conference in Medellin, Colombia just concluded. The city was showcased as a city of peace and a reformed more safer place for visitors and locals alike. 
Numbers revealed clearly show th progress made in Medellin. This weekend in a sad setback an unidentified assailant shot an American tourist in the Colombian city of Medellin, killing the 65-year-old visitor 
The American, identified as John Mariani, ws shot in the upscale El Poblado neighborhood, when getting out of his taxi. The case was identified as a murder robbery. 
Mr. Mariani was rushed to hospital and was pronounced deas. 
Authorities have offered a reward for information leading to an arrest in the case.
